title: 96/332/EC: Commission Decision of 3 May 1996 amending Decision 93/231/EEC, authorizing, in respect of the marketing of seed potatoes in all or part of the territory of certain Member States, more stringent measures against certain diseases than are provided for in Annexes I and II to Council Directive 66/403/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 May 1996 amending Decision 93/231/EEC, authorizing, in respect of the marketing of seed potatoes in all or part of the territory of certain Member States, more stringent measures against certain diseases than are provided for in Annexes I and II to Council Directive 66/403/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/332/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 93/231/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 May 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(2) OJ No L 6, 9. 1. 1996, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 106, 30. 4. 1993, p. 11.
(4) OJ No L 28, 7. 2. 1995, p. 13.
ANNEX
In the entry relating to Germany in the Annex to Decision 93/231/EEC, column 2 is replaced by the following:
'Bundesland Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
- Gemeinde Groß Lüsewitz
- Ortsteile Lindenhof und Pentz der Gemeinde Metschow
- Gemeinden Böhlendorf, Breesen, Langsdorf sowie Ortsteil Grammow der Gemeinde Grammow
- Gemeinden Hohenbrünzow, Hohenmocker, Ortsteil Ganschendorf der Gemeinde Sarow sowie Ortsteil Leistenow der Gemeinde Utzedel
- Gemeinden Ranzin, Lüssow und Gribow
- Gemeinde Pelsin.`
